title: 【搬运】恶魔复活！搬运恶魔城堡
author: fourhorsemen91
txt_content:
本帖最后由 fourhorsemen91 于 2013-12-20 00:47 编辑 

最近在PlanetMinecraft上看到的一个特喜欢的恶魔城堡。
搜索了一下论坛，好像没有撞车..
所以把这个搬运过来给大家分享!{:10_507:}



名称：The Demon's Resurrection    （恶魔的复活）
作者：TheSwordsEcho
介绍（英文):

*In goblin voice* It's great to see you have come to witness the master's resurrection! It'll be very soon master will rise again to destroy what you call home. I'm sure master has many plans laid out. Many things he wishes to do with you mortals before he rips you limb from limb! *evil laughter*
